thread.title: Armed man kills himself after standoff with police at Hollywood home
thread.title_full: Armed man kills himself after standoff with police at Hollywood home

author:

title: Armed man kills himself after standoff with police at Hollywood home
text:
Police, armed man with child in standoff at Hollywood home 
Woman told police the incident is ‘domestic’ 
BY CHRISTINA VEIGA AND CARLI TEPROFF 
cteproff@miamiherald.com Order Reprint of this Story 
Hollywood police negotiators and members of the department’s SWAT team responded to a home Sunday morning after a woman showed up at police headquarters to report that she had been “involved in domestic incident,” according to police. 
Officer Meredith Elrich said the woman in her 30s showed up with a minor child and said there was another child still in the home with a man. 
Police officers arrived at 7181 Taft St. — closed down the busy road — and were able to persuade the man to let the child go, Elrich said. 
By about 1 p.m. negotiators were still trying to get the man to surrender. They believe he has a weapon. 
Meanwhile, traffic backed up and curious neighbors came out of their homes to see what was going on. Taft Street was shut down from 70th Avenue to 72nd Terrace. Related content
